content:
Hi!

My name is David Rodriguez, former Higher Technician in Multi-Platform applications at ‘Centro de Estudios Superiores Fuencarral’ (one of the best rated ‘Vocational training schools’ in Madrid). 

I’m highly interested in doing an internship programme working as a Node or React Native developer at a company where I could both help and learn.

I am really interested in building a strong Node/React Native foundation, as a core base of my career.
I’m also a 42 School student, where I only code in the C programming language.

The internship program would be unpaid and would last at least 3 months, starting in March-April. 

If you have any doubt about anything, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you for your time,
David.
